original_title: China donates police uniform material to Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Chinese Embassy handed over a donation of material to the Government of Sri Lanka for the production of police uniforms.
The donation was made by the Ambassador of China to Sri Lanka, Qi Zhenhong, to the Minister of Public Security, Tiran Alles.
This donation was made at the President's Office in the presence of President Ranil Wickremesinghe.
